LanguageData.HadNukaCola.stages.0.label: Drank Nuka Cola
LanguageData.HadNukaCola.stages.0.description: That Cola was so healthy! I'm feeling good now.
LanguageData.HadColaDark.stages.0.label: Drank Dark Cola
LanguageData.HadColaDark.stages.0.description: That Cola was so healthy! I am absolutely confident that you can defeat death in hand-to-hand combat.
LanguageData.HadColaQuantum.stages.0.label: Drank Quantum Cola
LanguageData.HadColaQuantum.stages.0.description: That Cola was so healthy! The taste is like a miniature supernova exploding, a mix of citrus madness and sweet radiation. Your taste buds scream in either delight or pain.
LanguageData.IngestedRadHemogenPack.stages.0.label: Swallowed radioactive blood
LanguageData.IngestedRadHemogenPack.stages.0.descript: I swallowed a bag of radioactive blood. It may prolong my life, but the cost could be enormous, and it was absolutely disgusting.
LanguageData.RadFood.stages.0.label: ate wasteland, food
LanguageData.RadFood.stages.0.description: If I eat it and not the other way around, then I won.
LanguageData.FEV.stages.0.label: ate FEV
LanguageData.FEV.stages.0.description: If I eat it will be the last step.
LanguageData.HadScorponade.stages.0.label: Drank Scorponade
LanguageData.HadScorponade.stages.0.description: That Scorponade drink was so healthy! I'm feeling my heart is going to stop.
